title: Mount & Blade: Warband Reforged Edition (MULTI11) - FitGirl
description:

Interface Language: English, French, German, Spanish, Polish, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hungarian, Turkish, Russian

::Repack Features::


Based on Mount.and.Blade.Warband.Viking.Conquest.Reforged.Edition-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-mbvcre.iso (2,855,512,064 bytes)
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
Optional Russian fan localization added, not complete
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.7 to 1.7 GB)
Installation takes 3-5 minutes (depending on your system)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 4 GB
Repack by FitGirl
